column1: # - Offensive features advertised by vendor are explicitly disabled in this project and will not be used.

> **Image disclaimer:** The product/board images in this repo are for documentation and demo purposes only.
The ESP32/Marauder images were downloaded as reference/demo images from the web to represent the prototype they do not imply the physical hardware is currently in-hand.
I will update the repository with original photos and receipts when the components are available.
